title: Aerosoft - AES 1.92
description:
Aerosoft Airport Enhancement Services READ ME
Version 1.92


HISTORY

1.00 Release
1.10 More airport, more stability
1.10a New EDDF file
1.20 More airport, more stability
1.21 Set Parking-brakes and switch of the engines
- AES give the annoucment ?Blocks in Position?
- Now open the AES Menu via Ctrl-Shift-W
- Press the F3 key
- Now you get the command to ?Release Brakes?
- When the brakes are released, the aircraft is moving automatically to the correct place at the position
- Then you get the command ?Set Parking-brakes?
- When you have set the brakes, the position operation is restarted and the jetways will start to move.
- Automatic Aircraft ? Change - Detection
- Small change in Pushback-Procedure
1.30 
- New Airports (FlyTampa Airports: KBOS, KMDW,KSEA,KSFO)
- Some minor changes and fixes are done related to the feedback of costumers.
1.40
- New Airport (FlyTampa Airports: OMDB)
- New Airports (Simwings: LEAL,LEAM,LEJR,LEMG,LEPP,LEVC,LEXJ,LEGB)
- New Airports (GermanAirports: LOWI,EDFH,EDDB)
- Some changes and fixes are done related to the feedback of costumers.
